entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM app : impossible to update index.html in debug #58047
  • Setting PathBase breaks Browserlink #58046
  • Add checkbox checked validation #58044
  • libreria QuickGrid net core 8 #58040
  • Missing call to AddAuthorization() in Blazor Auto interactivity template #58039
  • Perf regression: json #58038
  • Add new overloads to IStringLocalizerFactory to enable creating IStringLocalizer instances for a specific culture #58037

Closed

  • Missing package README file #48392
    9.0.0
  • RenderMode names really hard to explain and confused a lot beginners. #58023
  • Micro Frontends with Blazor #58021
  • RequestDelegateGenerator generates invalid code for optional array parameters #57175
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plaintext, plaintext #58012
  • Perf improvement: caching #58019
  • .NET9 preview's OpenAPI document generation doesn't work when transcoded from gRPC #58010
  • NavigationManager.NavigateToLogout() stuck on authentication/logout-callback - reopen. #57202
  • Governing the date with EditForm #57860
  • How can one measure how long returning a static file takes? #57763

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Unquarantine ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows" #58043
    area-networking
  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #58035
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix up OpenAPI schema handling and support concurrent requests #58024
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rc.2.24468.2 #58028
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.EntityFrameworkCore` package README #57840
    area-middleware, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] Fix skip condition for IIS tests #57999
    tell-mode, area-networking, 9.0.0
  • Fix code generation for parsing optional array parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #57336
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57942
    area-infrastructure
  • Add public method to QuickGrid to close column options UI #57904
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • feat: extending `ApiBehaviorOptions` with skip `SkipStatusCodePages` #57597
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Unquarantine fixed tests that have not failed in 30 days #57978
    area-blazor
